description: This file is a test mock implementation for socket operations, providing mocked versions of socket and close functions used in testing the socket mock class.

methods.name: int socket(int domain,int type,int protocol)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the socket() function, calls the socket method on the global g_socketMock object.

methods.name: int close(int sockfd)
methods.description: Mock implementation of the close() function, calls the close method on the global g_socketMock object.

ctags.name: socket
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int socket(int domain, int type, int protocol)$/
